posts.post_title: Fs: T206 jake thielman broadleaf 350 psa 3!!  *SOLD*
posts.post_content: Very clean card for the grade. The last 2 comparable sales have been an sgc 30 for $1,382 (sterling auctions) and an sgc 40 for $1,673. Available for $1500 delivered, detailed scans available, just send me your email....thanks,  CARD IS SOLD, THANKS
